divs: Sighting DetailsMy friends and I were playing football next to my house in the early 60s, as achild, and saw a huge object moving slowly left to right accross the sky. It waslarger than a football feild long and silvery in color. We watched as it movedaccross the sky then it went out of sight. The next day the newspaper pressenterprise reported it was a weather balloon. This was no balloon. My wife, whoat the time, lived approx. 12 miles away saw the same type and size object whileskateboarding with several friends. We have never heard of this sighting on anyof the sightings shows and are curious about any similar reports at that time.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There were no other sightings in Riverside on or around November 30th 1960
